title: Secondo uno studio dell'università di Urbino l'algoritmo di Facebook ora punisce la politica ufficiale e premia gli estremisti antieuropei. Pd e FdI verso una legge bipartisan sulle piattaforme
snippet: This article discusses a study published on January 7, 2026, by the University of Urbino, authored by Professor Fabio Giglietto, analyzing the effects of Meta's algorithmic choices on the distribution and visibility of political content on its platforms. The study highlights transparency deficits, noting that the algorithmic suppression appears less effective against extremist actors than against institutional politicians.
description: The article discusses a study by Professor Fabio Giglietto from the University of Urbino, analyzing the impact of Facebook's algorithm on political content and highlighting transparency issues related to extremist content.

title: MENO POLITICA SU META, ESTREMISTI IN VANTAGGIO - 9Colonne
Il Premio Rimini Mundi a sette ambasciatori del congressuale - lapiazzarimini.it
„România, cea mai importantă țară din lume” vs. Vestul „cel rău” - narațiunile coordonate persistă - EURACTIV.ro
snippet: Refers to data analysis by Fabio Giglietto and Massimo Terenzi of the University of Urbino for the PROMPT project regarding coordinated inauthentic behavior during the Romanian elections.
description: This EURACTIV.ro article discusses coordinated inauthentic behavior during the Romanian elections, referencing data analysis conducted by Fabio Giglietto and Massimo Terenzi of the University of Urbino for the PROMPT project.

title: A year since the TikTok Messiah's rise, the shock is far from over - EURACTIV.ro
snippet: Mentions data analysis conducted by Fabio Giglietto and Massimo Terenzi from the University of Urbino for the PROMPT project, which analyzed Facebook posts related to the Romanian elections to detect coordinated inauthentic behavior.
description: This EURACTIV.ro article discusses the impact of TikTok influencers and mentions data analysis conducted by Fabio Giglietto and Massimo Terenzi for the PROMPT project at the University of Urbino to detect coordinated inauthentic behavior during Romanian elections.

title: Advancing Research on Disinformation and Digital Manipulation: The University of Urbino at two Key Conferences in Brazil – vera.ai VERification Assisted by Artificial Intelligence
snippet: Reports on Fabio Giglietto's presentations at conferences in Brazil, where he presented collaborative research using LLMs to analyze political discourse in hyperpartisan Facebook groups and moderated a roundtable discussion on data access in the DSA era.
description: This article reports on Fabio Giglietto's presentations at conferences in Brazil discussing collaborative research using LLMs to analyze political discourse and moderating a discussion on data access.

title: Il movimento religioso cinese che si è infiltrato in un gruppo Facebook urbinate - il Ducato
